data.lyric:
[ti:Skate]
[ar:Bruno Mars/Anderson .Paak/Silk Sonic]
[al:Skate (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Skate - Bruno Mars (布鲁诺·马尔斯)/Anderson .Paak/Silk Sonic
[00:02.08]Lyrics by：Bruno Mars/Brandon Anderson/Dernst Emile II/James Fauntleroy/Domitille Degalle/J.D. Beck
[00:04.16]Anderson .Paak：
[00:04.55]
[00:15.75]Oh my oh my
[00:17.36]
[00:19.82]In a room full of dimes
[00:21.13]
[00:21.73]You would be a hundred dollars
[00:23.76]If bein' fine was a crime
[00:25.34]Girl they'd lock your lil' fine a*s up in a tower
[00:27.83]The way you move like you do
[00:29.71]Ooh it's like you do it for a livin'
[00:31.96]Do a lil' spin do it again
[00:34.09]S**t look like you playin' for the win oh baby
[00:36.74]Bruno Mars/Anderson .Paak：
[00:37.34]
[00:38.23]I'm tryna roll I'm tryna ride
[00:41.41]
[00:42.65]I'm tryna float I'm tryna glide
[00:45.66]
[00:46.72]No no don't be shy just take my hand and hold on tight
[00:52.63]Bruno Mars：
[00:53.09]Oh skate to me baby
[00:55.39]
[00:56.68]Skate
[00:56.88]
[00:58.17]Slide your way on over
[01:00.28]Slide your way on over
[01:02.16]Oh skate to me baby
[01:04.10]
[01:05.01]Skate
[01:05.22]
[01:06.58]I wanna get to know ya
[01:08.92]I wanna get to know ya
[01:10.75]Come on
[01:11.00]
[01:15.66]Oh my oh my
[01:17.16]
[01:19.35]Got your hair in the wind and your skin glistenin'
[01:23.69]I can smell your sweet perfume
[01:25.60]Mmm you smell better than a barbecue
[01:27.55]Oh superstar is what you are
[01:32.93]I'm your biggest fan
[01:34.50]If you're lookin' for a man sugar here I am
[01:36.89]
[01:37.77]Ooh

[01:38.30]I'm tryna roll I'm tryna ride
[01:40.46]I'm tryna ride with ya darlin'
[01:42.64]I'm tryna float I'm tryna glide
[01:45.44]

[02:08.86]I wanna get to know ya

[02:11.19]I never fall but tonight you got me fallin' for you
[02:16.18]

[02:25.25]Girl let's groove
[02:28.25]

[02:40.36]My oh my my oh my
